alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:26PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Graham County through 615 PM MST... At 525 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles south of West Poker Mountain to 8 miles northeast of Safford Regional Airport. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds ahead of these thunderstorms could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects without producing any rainfall in the Gila River Valley. Locations impacted include... Safford, Thatcher, Solomon, Safford Regional Airport, Pima, Bylas, Central and Fort Thomas. This includes the following highways... Route 70 between mile markers 295 and 313, and between mile markers 326 and 347. Route 191 between mile markers 119 and 120.was located along a line MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
